taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have an enumeration with multiple values in your domain model file.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, expand the enumeration.
Holding down the left-mouse button, drag the enumerated value to its desired location in the enumeration.

taskbody.result: The order of display of the enumeration values is changed. This new order is reflected in combo box widgets sorted by value.
